title: Again and again the problem of upload PDF files!
content:
Hi everyone,

This subject has been discussed several times here and my self already had problems with this and posted the problem. I think is time to look at the problem and figure out what to do to solve it.  
I try to edit a forum post in order to attach a pdf file.  
I do the “Edit” and open the “File attachments”.  
“Attach new file” and “Attach”. The file is show in the list and selected in “List”.  
Do the “Submit” and the file disapear and dont show on the post!  
This problem is in both Firefox and IE...  
I have just installed the “last” flash player in case someone tries the “download the last version of....and try again!”

Why is the upload of a simple file directly connected with flash? Is this really necessary? Wich software is used for this forum?Opensource or developed especially for this purpose (typophile I mean...)?

António Fonseca

 [‹ Resources for moods/messages in typefaces?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905212045/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41279 "Go to previous forum topic") [Flesh Font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905212045/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41284 "Go to next forum topic")
author: afonseca1974

comments.content: Click ’submit’ directly after browsing for the file, without pressing ’attach’ first.

Thanks Quincunx!  
Aparently is working now!

António
Well, it’s not really ideal, but it does work that way. :)
